spwallet.tooltip.simpleMode:
If enabled, it will show the counters separately with no boxes.

By default, it is built into the interface.
However, if something runs into each other or looks ugly,
you can adjust the position of the counters with the Editor Mode.
spwallet.tooltip.editorMode:
Toggles the capability to move counters.

To do this, you need to hit the counter icon with LMB and move
the counter with the arrows to the right place,
then press Enter to save or Esc to reset.
spwallet.config.showInInventoryCount: Add card Diamond Ores to inventory counter
spwallet.tooltip.cardId: A guide on how to get an API card token and card ID can be found on the mod page.
spwallet.get.bad_api: An error has occurred! SPworlds API is in 'DDoS protection', so it's impossible to get card balance. Please wait until the bug on SPworlds side is fixed
spwallet.get.fail: An error has occurred! Check the correctness of the ID and token and the availability of the SPworlds website, try again later or report a bug in Issues.
